sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A helicopter crash in a Kyiv suburb has killed at least 18 people, including Ukraine's

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: interior minister and three children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Denis Monastrisky and two other government officials were among the nine victims aboard the emergency services helicopter that crashed near a nursery in Kyiv's eastern suburb of Brovary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Kyiv has confirmed that Monastrysky, who is the most senior Ukrainian official to have died since the start of the war, was on his way to the front line.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Monastrysky was in charge of the Ukrainian police and other emergency services.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The regional governor said a total of 29 people were injured, including 15 children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Russia's foreign affairs minister has lashed out at the West's support for Ukraine in a series of fierce rhetorical blows during an hour-long news conference in Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Speaking to reporters, Sergei Lavrov claimed the West was to blame for hostilities in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: SERGEI LAVROV, Russian Foreign Minister What is taking place now in Ukraine is the result of many years of preparation by the United States and its allies to start a global hybrid war against the Russian Federation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In fact, nobody hides this.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Just recently, Croatian President Milanovic said that this is NATO's war against Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's a straightforward and honest statement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: against Russia. It's a straightforward and honest statement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Lavrov also appeared to rule out peace talks, saying it was the West which had prevented Kiev from negotiating.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The West decides on behalf of Ukraine. It was them who forbade Zelensky to reach an agreement with Russia at the end of March last year, when such an agreement was ready.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: So the West decides, and such an agreement was ready.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: So the West decides, and decides for Ukraine without Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russian President Vladimir Putin, seen here at a World War II commemoration in St. Petersburg, has long blamed the West for provoking the war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But as the West steps up military aid for Kiev, the Kremlin's rhetoric is becoming increasingly hostile.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This central figure in the corruption scandal at the European Parliament, the former MEP Pierre Antonio Panzeri, has admitted guilt and signed a deal to share details with Belgian authorities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In exchange for a limited sentence, he will make substantial and revealing statements about the cash for influence corruption scandal linked to Qatar and Morocco.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: According to the federal prosecutor's office, he will reveal information about the modus operandi of the criminal organization, the financial arrangements and the involvement of known and unknown persons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And this will include the identity of the persons he admits to having breathed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some MEPs hope this will help to accelerate the investigation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Pancelis' decision to cooperate with the Belgian authorities could open a window to speed up the unraveling of this huge scandal of corruption. και την ανοιχτή πρόκληση αυτού του σκανδάλου της καταστροφής.

sentences.sentence: Ελπίζουμε να έχουμε περισσότερες όνομα και να προχωρήσουμε πιο κοντά στην αλήθεια, όσο μπορεί.

sentences.sentence: Ο Μέλγιος κοινός έχει αναφέρει ότι αφήθηκε να αφήνει με 120.000 ευρώ έναν άλλο κοινό, τον ΜΕΠ Μαρκ Ταραβελά.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Σύμφωνα με τον δικαστή του, ο Πανζέρης έχει συμφωνήσει με την αφήνωση των 1.000.000 ευρώ και την έκπληξη του 5 χρόνου. Marc Tarabella. According to his lawyer, Panzeri has agreed to 1 million euros confiscation and a five-year suspension sentence, but he will just remain in prison for a maximum of a year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It is the second time in Belgian legal history that this kind of memorandum of repentance is signed. Aida Sánchez Alonso, Euronews, Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Nurses in England have returned to the picket line as part of an unprecedented push to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: demand better pay amid soaring inflation. With negotiations between health unions and the government at a stalemate, thousands have walked out at hospitals across the country in a series of stoppages planned for today and tomorrow. Health workers are calling for a pay rise of five percent above inflation, but their representatives have said they could compromise if the government gets directly involved in negotiations with employers. The strike heaps added pressure on the UK Health Service that's struggling to cope with post-Brexit staff shortages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The billionaire and more recently Twitter CEO is facing a civil lawsuit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He is being sued by Tesla shareholders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The case centers around his tweets in 2018 saying he would take Tesla private.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: While he's still CEO of Tesla, but this has to do with, basically, he took Twitter private and he, at one point, was floating the idea of he's gonna take Tesla private.

sentences.sentence: Potential jurors on Tuesday were questioned about their impartiality, and by the end of the day, nine were selected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Musk has always maintained he has done nothing wrong, and argues he cannot get a fair trial in San Francisco.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He pushed for it to take place in Texas instead, where he moved Tesla's headquarters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But that was rejected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Belarus, the trial of the former presidential candidate Svetlana Tikhanovskaya and other key opposition figures is underway in the capital Minsk. They are charged in their absence

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: with various offences including treason, extremism and undermining national security. Tikhanovskaya herself is in Davos at the World Economic Forum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: First of all, I would call it a so-called trial because it has nothing to do with justice in our country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: So all these trials are revenge on those who are opposing the regime of Lukashenko or opposing the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So I'm not expecting anything for sure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I will be sentenced to years and years in prison. The judge will give me so many years as he's ordered.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The prosecutor's office accuses the leaders of the Coordinating Council of the Opposition of organizing mass riots, seizing buildings and attempting a change of power in an unconstitutional way. The defendants face being sentenced to decades in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The process is being held behind closed doors, and Tikhanovskaya says she can't access any material from the case.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Other journalists and activists on trial in Belarus include the general director and editor-in-chief of the Tukbi independent news portal, Lyudmila Chikina and Marina Zolotova, as well as the heads of the Vyazna Human Rights Centre, among them Nobel Peace Prize winner Alice Bialyatsky.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Thousands of protesters march through Peru's capital Lima to keep up pressure against the government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At the same time, a counter-demonstration with community groups and political parties rejecting the protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The country is divided over its president, Dina Boluate. It's five weeks since her predecessor, Pedro Castillo, was removed from office and arrested. Five weeks of deadly protests that began in early December.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The president called on the demonstrators flooding into Lima to gather peacefully and calmly, even as they demand her resignation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: With tensions mounting, many poor and indigenous demonstrators who'd come by bus to Lima were already making their presence felt in the capital on Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Philippine Nobel laureate Maria Ressa and her new site, Rappler, have been cleared of tax evasion charges. An emotional Ressa following today's verdict said, Today, facts win, truth wins, justice wins.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The veteran journalist previously described the charges as politically motivated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Ressa was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize alongside a Russian journalist in 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: She is the head of Rappler, which has earned a reputation for its in-depth reporting and tough scrutiny of the Philippines' former president, Rodrigo Juterta.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The world's oldest person, French nun Sister Andrée, has died at the age of 118.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Lucille Rondon was born in 1904 and took the name Sister Andrée when she joined a Catholic charitable order in 1944.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Sister Andrée died in the early hours of Tuesday morning at her retirement home in France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Last year, she survived contracting COVID-19.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The world's oldest person is now Maria Branyes Morera, who's aged 115 and lives in Spain.
